title: Execute Venue Changeover
description: The operations team needs to convert the arena from a hockey rink setup to a basketball court setup overnight.

tasks.description: Retrieve the standard operating procedure (SOP) for the hockey-to-basketball changeover.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the detailed checklist and timeline for the conversion.

tasks.description: Create and assign tasks to the various crews (e.g., ice crew, floor crew, seating crew) in the work order system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates all necessary work orders for the changeover.

tasks.description: Monitor the progress of the changeover against the timeline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent tracks the completion of each major task in real-time.

tasks.description: Once complete, perform a final quality check and mark the venue as 'Ready' for the next event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the venue is ready and updates its status in the master calendar.
